code_generation_default.preamble: Implement the specified functionality following best practices and project conventions. Include error handling, input validation, and inline documentation. Ensure code is production-ready and tested.

text_generation_default.preamble: Create well-structured text content that is clear, concise, and appropriate for the target audience. Follow specified format and style guidelines. Include relevant examples and references.
